main.name: Zack Moscow
main.description: with extensive leadership and entrepreneurship experience. I've led teams in project management, creative oversight, market expansion, product innovation and Fortune-100 B2B sales. I'm an inventive and agile problem solver with a quick-learning aptitude for new technologies and a get-it-done attitude. Let's build together.
main.bio: When I'm not coding or working on startup ideas, I enjoy playing board games (especially Catan and Backgammon), tinkering with vintage synthesizers and organs, golfing, cooking, and watching college basketball (University of Kentucky) and pro hockey (Nashville Predators)!

skills.skillmessage: HERE ARE SOME WEB TECHNOLOGIES I LIKE WORKING WITH:

education.description: An intensive program focused on gaining programming proficiency in a wide range of web technologies. Received "MVP" award from instructional team; A+ academic average.
Major through the Annenberg School of Communication with additional management and marketing coursework through the Wharton School of Business.

work.title: Owner
work.description: Ran daily operations for a boutique wine importer focused on organic European wines in sustainable packaging. Led annual business planning with wholesalers, brand identity refresh with increased supply chain profitability, market expansion and product innovations.

work.title: Director of Sales (New Markets and National Accounts)
work.description: Played integral role in growing Rhinegeist from a startup microbrewery to a top-50 US craft brewer. Founded and fostered relationships with key national accounts. Led sales analytics and forecasting team (sales reports, syndicated data analysis, competitive/pricing analysis.)

projects.title: The Game of Prompts
projects.category: A multiplayer party game where users can submit and match responses to a prompt.

projects.title: Club Soda
projects.category: A full stack web app designed to organize meet-ups for users with common interests.

projects.title: ReelStream
projects.category: An application to search for any movie and provide relevant information.

projects.title: Best Buy Store
projects.category: A full stack app allowing users to search the Best Buy API and add products to a cart.
